In this blog we share out data science experience at 2DII. Here are some of the projects you may read about:

* [ds-incubator](https://github.com/2DegreesInvesting/ds-incubator): Weekly meetups to share best practices.
* [coding-helpdesk](https://github.com/2DegreesInvesting/coding-helpdesk): Live support by appointment.
* [r2dii](https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/r2dii/index.html): A collection of R packages we maintain.
